author: Staff Reporter
text:
Tension gripped Sukkuvadanpatti village near Theni Allinagaram near here on Friday as two groups clashed with each other over erecting a banner on the main road.

When a group of persons erected a banner on the road and decorated it with festoons, the rival group protested to it.

Later, a quarrel erupted between them and members of both the groups pelted stones at each other. The police resorted to a mild lathi charge to disperse the unruly mob and bring the situation under control.

Heavy police were deployed at the village. Meanwhile, the police secured a few persons on both sides and inquired them.
title: Group clash: tension at Sukkuvadanpatti village
